articles.title: Democrats dare GOP to filibuster Asian American hate crimes bill - POLITICO
articles.description: No final decision has been made, but some Republicans see it as an overreach and others think it's just a messaging bill.
articles.content: Senate Minority Whip John Thune (R-S.D.) said that Republicans are considering voting to open debate and offering amendments on the hate crimes measure. Some in the GOP may want an opportunity to eng… [+3539 chars]

articles.author: Adam Zagoria
articles.title: NBA Postpones Nets-Timberwolves Game In Wake Of Fatal Police Shooting In Minnesota - Forbes
articles.description: The NBA has postponed Monday’s Brooklyn Nets-Minnesota Timberwolves game in the wake of the fatal shooting on Sunday of Daunte Wright, a 20-year-old African-American man, in Brooklyn Center, Minn.

articles.title: Pfizer wanted Brazil, Argentina to put military bases, Federal reserve as collateral: Why India kept Pfizer away and how the usual suspects are wrong - OpIndia
articles.description: Pfizer has been accused of countries in Latin America of pledging their sovereign assets, military bases and financial reserves to protect itself from any adverse fallout of the vaccine | OpIndia News
